title: How to Cook Gulai Salai Ikan Khas Palembang (Smoked Fish Curry)

steps.headline: Heat 2 teaspoons of coconut oil in a wok or a cooking pot over medium-high heat.
Grind the spices.
steps.description: Sauté the ground spices, along with 3 fresh lime leaves until well-cooked and they release a fragrant scent.

steps.headline: Add a half liter of coconut milk to the previous ingredients.
Add the 14 pieces of smoked fish and stir-fry.
Make sure that the 14 pieces of smoked fish are perfectly cooked.
Add the rest of coconut milk along with eggplants and beans.
steps.description: Stir-fry until hot and well combined.

steps.headline: Add salt and sugar.
steps.description: Add a sufficient amount according to your own taste.

steps.headline: Cook until the spices are absorbed.
Serve straight away.
steps.description: This food is usually eaten with rice.

text: Heat 2 teaspoons of coconut oil in a wok or a cooking pot over medium-high heat.  Grind the spices. Sauté the ground spices, along with 3 fresh lime leaves until well-cooked and they release a fragrant scent. Add a half liter of coconut milk to the previous ingredients.  Add the 14 pieces of smoked fish and stir-fry.  Add a glass of water.  Make sure that the 14 pieces of smoked fish are perfectly cooked.  Add the rest of coconut milk along with eggplants and beans. Stir-fry until hot and well combined. Add salt and sugar. Add a sufficient amount according to your own taste. Cook until the spices are absorbed.  Serve straight away. This food is usually eaten with rice.
